URL: [base]/Patient/$occupation

Parameters

UseNameScopeCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INpatient1..1Reference (Patient)

A direct resource reference to the patient resource.

INnocache0..1boolean

Specifies when the operation should ignore the value stored in the cache and should re-request data from the source. By default false.

OUTreturn1..1Bundle

Returns Bundle (with type 'collection') with Observation instances.

name: EEMPIPatientOccupation
title: Patient occupation
description: The observation of patient occupations from Employment Register (TÃ–R).

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: A direct resource reference to the patient resource.

parameter.name: nocache
parameter.documentation: Specifies when the operation should ignore the value stored in the cache and should re-request data from the source. By default *false*.

parameter.name: return
